Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: Auto-enrolment with the Frequent Traveller Option, and a waiver of S$40 enrolment fees. Cardmember can redeem your points with over 40 of the world's renowned airlines.

Complimentary The Far Card Membership worth S$425. Up to 50% savings when dining at a wide selection of restaurants islandwide. 1 for 1 drinks or complimentary bespoke cocktails/beer at most fashionable bars in Singapore.
Earn 2 Membership Rewards Points for every $1.60 spent. Earn 10 Membership Rewards Points for every S$1.60 spent at Platinum EXTRA partners (eg: Reebonz, Harvery Norman, Montblanc).

Details.Name: sc_gift_details
Details.Feature: 2 options available: 1. Full Fee Offer: Samsung Tab A with S Pen (8.0”) with wifi worth S$551 + Tumi Vapor Luggage worth S$825 2. First Year Fee Waiver Offer: First year fee waiver worth S$321 + Samsonite Armet Spinner 57cm worth S$380

Details.Name: sc_gift_cond
Details.Feature: 1. Galaxy Tab A with S Pen (8.0"): Pay the full annual fee of $321 upfront. 2. TUMI VAPOR International Carry-on Travel Luggage and Samsonite Armet Spinner 57cm Expandable Luggage: Card members have to charge a min spend of $7500 spend within the first 6 months of the card approval to be eligible for the gift. 3. First Year Fee Waiver: Only applies to brand new American Express Card Members who do not have any other existing American Express Cards

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Minimum Repayment: 3% of the outstanding balance or S$50 whichever is higher.

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: If your account has three or more defaults and/or one default unpaid for two or more consecutive months, 29.99% interest p.a. will be charged instead.
